title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
rrodriguez left at 00:52 (Quit: rrodriguez  
sdumitriu - (01:26): vmassol: Still up?  
vmassol - (01:26): yes but not for long  
sdumitriu - (01:26): I think there's something wrong  
vmassol - (01:26): in 2.6RC2?  
sdumitriu - (01:26): There are no activities recorded  
vmassol - (01:27): worked locally  
vmassol - (01:27): just added a page  
vmassol - (01:27): and it appeared in the activity stream  
sdumitriu - (01:27): I think it only works in the main wiki  
vmassol - (01:27): ah  
vmassol - (01:27): haven't tested this  
vmassol - (01:27): but yes  
vmassol - (01:27): I mentioned it in an email  
vmassol - (01:27): or irc  
vmassol - (01:27): and evalica said it was done volunterily  
vmassol - (01:28): it's meant only for the current wiki  
vmassol - (01:28): oh  
vmassol - (01:28): main wiki  
vmassol - (01:28): not current wiki  
vmassol - (01:28): hmm  
vmassol - (01:28): indeed that would be a bug  
vmassol - (01:28): need to report it so that we can fix it for 2.6 final  
vmassol - (01:29): sdumitriu: night time, nn  
sdumitriu - (01:29): Me too  
sdumitriu - (01:29): Good night  
vmassol left at 01:29 (Quit: Leaving.

vmassol - (18:02): anyone has any idea why I cannot trigger a build for http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/Platform/job/xwiki-archetypes/ ?  
cjdelisle - (18:04): `` Disable Build (No new builds will be executed until the project is re-enabled.)''  
cjdelisle - (18:04): maybe that?  
vmassol - (18:04): hi cjdelisle, where do you see this?  
cjdelisle - (18:04): http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/Platform/job/xwiki-archetypes/configure  
cjdelisle - (18:04): Toward the top.  
vmassol - (18:06): thanks cjdelisle  
vmassol - (18:06): I know what happened  
vmassol - (18:07): it disabled itself since the svn location was changed  
vmassol - (18:07): then I renamed it  
vmassol - (18:07): but didn't uncheck this option  
cjdelisle - (18:07): Ahh.  
vmassol - (18:08): (the urls were changed because I refactored the archtetype to introduce a parent archtetype module)
